reviewText: Really Sad with a capital S that the decendants of Schulz will not let biographies go to DVDs and Blu-rays.  This is the first VHS tape I have bought in over 12 years.  Now that the former voice actor for the cartoon character C Brown is in legal trouble, maybe people will want to go back and see what the author's problems were.  One up to date mess can trigger interests that have died down, I hope.
